mapper.select: select * from user_info_tb where ui_email = #{ui_email} and ui_password = #{ui_password}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info_tb (ui_name, ui_email, ui_addr, ui_phone, ui_gender, ui_birth, ui_password) values (#{ui_name}, #{ui_email}, #{ui_addr}, #{ui_phone}, #{ui_gender}, #{ui_birth}, #{ui_password})
